trans-unit.target: TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB1_00572_EISMON_000_001<tab>I never thought of forging anything metallic for the Zun. They always seemed like a “bone and hide” kind of people...
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB1_00572_EISMON_000_050<tab>I'd almost forgotten what it was like to feel the weight of coins in my pocket...
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB1_00572_EISMON_000_100<tab>With Iola on one side, and Colana on the other, I'm feeling a bit squeezed in the middle. If only Rend were here, he'd gladly take some of the heat.
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB1_00572_EISMON_100_100<tab>Even with Rend back, I'm still getting the heavy end of the hammer. Aye, it was a faint hope at best...

TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB1_00572_EISMON_000_150<tab>You're an inspiration, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I may not have your imagination, but I'm willing to give this new merchandise thing a damn good try!
TEXT_CTSDKBCHARACTER1SUB1_00572_EISMON_000_200<tab>Right, something new, something new... I'm drawing a complete blank.
